title: Calories in In-N-Out Milkshake
meta_description: Get milkshake in n out calories details: a regular chocolate shake has 590 kcal, with full macros, sodium, and tips for variations under 160 chars.
assumptions: Regular chocolate milkshake from In-N-Out Burger; based on official nutrition data, approximately 24 oz serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, exact preparation, and location; check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A regular In-N-Out chocolate milkshake contains about 590 kcal and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out milkshake?
faqs.a: About 590 kcal for a regular chocolate milkshake.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in milkshake in n out calories breakdown?
faqs.a: Around 70 g total carbs, including 64 g sugars, per shake.

faqs.q: Is the fat content high in In-N-Out milkshakes?
faqs.a: Yes, 30 g total fat with 19 g saturated per chocolate shake.

faqs.q: How does strawberry milkshake in n out calories compare?
faqs.a: Similar at about 580 kcal, with slight variations in sugars.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out milkshake?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g protein per regular serving.
